(*Laughs* Hork-Bajir sounds cool! And yes, you got it right the first 
time. I've been falling a bit behind in the Series as well, but I 
just got the 'Visser Chronicals' and the front page inspired me.. 
*_*. Uuhh.. human, scorpian, horse.. aanndd aahhh... something that 
has stalk eyes. LOL But no - he's black furred and black eyed! And he 
has poison. *grinz*)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (LOL.  Fine.  I'll bring in a Hork-Bajir!  Or...Bajar...how do you 
spell 
> that?  Been a while since I read the series.  So how do you account 
for your 
> Andalite?  Mix between a horse, human, scorpion, and an unknown 
blue-furred 
> alien?)
